CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1946, pg. 3, reads: "Family Gathering - The well-liked Bolden family of upper Webster Avenue Extension is shown here in part. Mrs. Bolden, seated; Mr. Bolden to her right, Jo Ann, to her mother's left, and Gloria, in back of the chair.  Missing from the picture are:  Jesse, Tuskegee gridder; George, Air Force lieutenant, and Kathryn, graduate student at the University of Wisconsin. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Bolden family, including Mrs. Bolden seated in center, Mr. Bolden, Gloria Bolden wearing deer sweater in center, and Jo Ann on right, posed in living room of their home, Webster Avenue Extension, horizontal format
